php.LBL_ADVANCED_PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION: Custom permission configuration, grant or withdraw permissions to records.
php.ERR_INACTIVE_ALERT_DESC: Zmeň PERMITTED_BY_ADVANCED_PERMISSION  parameter v config/security.php súbor e pre aktiváciu.
php.LBL_RECALCULATE_CRON_INFO: Permission recalculations requires enabled CRON, please check if the task is active.
php.ERR_INACTIVE_CACHING_PERM_ALERT_DESC: Special permissions have been disabled because they require enabling record permission caching. For the permissions to start working you should enable cron, and set CACHING_PERMISSION_TO_RECORD [config/security.php] variable to true.
